EmissionsExtension.title: EmissionsExtension
EmissionsExtension.description: An extension for the Emissions class to provide a comparison operator.

comparisonOperator.title: comparisonOperator
comparisonOperator.description: A comparison operator for the applicable emission classifications in correspondence to the specified value. The comparison applies to the Roman- or Arabic-numbered portion (e.g. euro6 > euro5b), but not crosswise (e.g. euro6 cannot be compared to euroV).
